items.title: LG’s 45-inch 5K2K WUHD 330Hz dual-mode OLED gaming monitor is a whopping $650 off today
items.summary:
We just spotted a deal at Amazon that gets you LG’s 45-inch UltraGear (45GX950A-B) OLED curved 5K2K gaming monitor down to $1,350.18 shipped. That’s a straight-up $650 discount on its $2,000 usual going rate and one of the lowest prices we have tracked for it to date. Today’s 32% markdown on its usual going rate lands it within just $38 of the all-time low price it hit earlier this year. We recently saw the standard 240Hz WQHD variant of this monitor go for less, but this particular model has dual-mode support with which you can push it up to 330Hz for competitive gaming. You can learn more about it below.

items.summary: The deal comes nearly five years after Etsy purchased Depop for $1.62 billion, at a time when secondhand clothing apps were gaining traction during the pandemic.

items.summary:
Amazon’s Presidents Day event started last week and, while it mysteriously disappeared this morning for a short while, Amazon has informed us today is indeed the final 24 hours of the sale. Not all of the deals are still live, but there are plenty of them still kicking and we wanted to let everyone know that, despite the fake out this morning, today is indeed your last shot at the 2026 Amazon Presidents Day sale.
